0.2.name: wordpress/wow-hunters-hall-rss-feed
0.2.description: This is a very simple plugin to create a new widget which will automatically grab the RSS feed from the WoW Hunter's Hall web site and display between 1 and 10 posts from that site in a widget-ready sidebar on yours. Could you do this with the normal WordPress RSS widget? Sure! But you'd need to know the location of the feed. With this plugin, you don't.
